text: Koly ty dyvyshsya na nykh, to vrazhaye tebe krasa til yikhnikh, i koly hovoryatʹ vony, to ty slukhayesh yikh. Ta vony — nache kolody, shcho pidpyrayutʹ parkan, i kozhen zoyk vony vvazhayutʹ zahrozoyu sobi. Vony — vorohy, tozh berezhysʹ yikh! Nekhay vrazytʹ yikh Allah! Yak zhe viddalylysya vony
